cmp: 可 (can/may/able to/certain(ly)/to suit/(particle used for emphasis))
mng: to send, to mail, to entrust, to depend on, to attach oneself to, to live (in a house), to lodge, foster (son etc)

exm.mng: to send, to mail, to entrust, to depend on, to attach oneself to, to live (in a house), to lodge, foster (son etc)
to forward (a message, letter, article etc)
to place (hope, importance etc) on, to express, to show, to give
to stay, to lodge, to board
to live in or on another organism as a parasite, to live by taking advantage of others, parasitism, parasitic
to deposit, to store, to leave sth with sb
to mail, to send by post
to have sb look after sb, to entrust the care of sb, to place (hope etc) on
to mail, to send by post
